means.word_mean: 做某工作的男孩（或小伙子）；伙计
（对本国士兵的昵称）兵哥哥们，小伙子们

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express the view that mischievous or childish behaviour is typical of boys or young men and should not cause surprise when it occurs
jx.jx_cn_mean: 孩子总是孩子嘛！（意为男孩子难免要淘气，不足为怪）

jx.jx_en_mean: men or organizations considered to be the most powerful and successful

entry.def: A boy is a child who will grow up to be a man.

example.ex: I knew him when he was a little boy...
example.tran: 他还是个小男孩的时候我就认识他了。

example.ex: He was still just a boy.

entry.def: You can refer to a young man as a boy, especially when talking about relationships between boys and girls.
entry.tran: 男青年，小伙子（尤用于指青年男女恋爱关系时）

example.ex: ...the age when girls get interested in boys.
example.tran: 姑娘开始对小伙子感兴趣的年龄

example.ex: Eric was my cousin Edward's boy...
example.tran: 埃里克是我表兄爱德华的儿子。

entry.def: You can refer to a man as a boy, especially when you are talking about him in an affectionate way.
entry.tran: 家伙，伙计（尤用于亲切谈论某人时）

example.tran: 当上总统的本地小伙子

example.ex: 'Come on boys', he shouted to the sailors.
example.tran: “加把劲儿，伙计们”，他向船员们喊道。

entry.def: You can use boy when giving instructions to a horse or dog.
entry.tran: 家伙，伙计（用于吆喝马或狗时）

entry.def: The police are sometimes referred to as the boys in blue .
Some people say 'boy' or 'oh boy' in order to express feelings of excitement or admiration.
entry.tran: 好家伙(表示激动、羡慕等情感）

example.ex: Oh Boy! Just think what I could tell him.
example.tran: 哇，好家伙！想想看我会告诉他什么。

entry.def: If you say boys will be boys, for example when a group of men are behaving noisily or aggressively, you are suggesting in a light-hearted way that this is typical male behaviour and will never change.
entry.tran: 男人总归是男人（用以表示男人的典型行为不会改变）

entry.def: If a man is described as one of the boys, he is accepted by a group of male friends who do things that are thought of as typically masculine.

example.ex: He wants to be accepted as one of the boys.
example.tran: 他想被人看作一个男子汉。

sentences.sentence: "she made the boy brush his teeth every night"
"most soldiers are only boys in uniform"

means.word_mean: 2. a friendly informal reference to a grown man;

sentences.sentence: "he likes to play golf with the boys"
"his boy is taller than he is"

means.word_mean: 4. (ethnic slur) offensive term for Black man;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (denoting a male servant): of unknown origin

means: 好家伙（表示激动、羡慕等情感）

sentences.en: That young boy of hers is quite a handful.

sentences.cn: 本·维德: 只有你留下来, 丹, 只有你和你的儿子.
sentences.en: Ben Wade: Just you left, Dan. Just you and your boy.

sentences.cn: 她过去经常到医院来, 是来打听你儿子的病情的.
sentences.en: She used to call by regularly, you know , and enquire about your boy.

sentences.cn: 你的儿子是个多么可爱的小家伙呵!
sentences.en: What a fine little beggar your boy is!

sentences.cn: 格林先生有一个儿子和两个女儿.
sentences.en: Mr Green has one boy and two daughters.

sentences.cn: 如果他们让儿子在北京上学 呢 ?
sentences.en: What if they have the boy go to schools in Beijing?

sentences.cn: 是时候我们学校接儿子了.
sentences.en: It's time we went to school pick up boy.

sentences.cn: 很抱歉,我的儿子昨天在你家里捣乱.
sentences.en: I'm sorry my boy was acting up in your house yesterday.

sentences.cn: 这是我的小儿子.
sentences.en: This is my little boy.

sentences.cn: 儿子:妈妈, 上帝是男人还是女人?
sentences.en: A boy says to her mother , " Mom, is God a man or woman? "

sentences.cn: 我将派儿子去取书.
sentences.en: I'll send my boy round to collect the book.

sentences.cn: 他将他的儿子取名为史蒂文.
sentences.en: He called his boy Steven.

sentences.cn: 她有两个女儿和一个儿子.
sentences.en: She has two girls and a boy.

sentences.cn: 他这“多多头”的小儿子不老成, 他知道.
sentences.en: The boy hadn't much sense of propriety, he well knew.

sentences.cn: 他的儿子好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨.
sentences.en: His boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.

sentences.cn: 父亲说: 我的儿子, 刚开始学是有点, 后面就好学了.
sentences.en: Father: my boy, at the beginning it is, but after it becomes easy.

sentences.cn: 她偏爱她的小儿子.
sentences.en: She is partial to her youngest boy.

sentences.cn: 所以你起身回家去吧. 你的脚一进城, 你儿子就必死了.
sentences.en: As for you, go back home. you set foot in your city, the boy will die.

sentences.cn: 我们挑选了一个有女划桨手和她的小儿子的船,带我们到邛竹寺.
sentences.en: We picked out an oarswoman and her young boy to ferry us to the temples.

sentences.cn: 一定让你的儿子准备好去热带的装备.
sentences.en: Make sure that your boy is kitted out for the tropics.

sentences.cn: 我儿子看起来有些不舒服. 他是否工作过度了?
sentences.en: My boy is not looking well. Has he been overworking?

sentences.cn: 你信不信他们到现在还在给我儿子寄垃圾邮件?
sentences.en: Do you believe they're still sending junk mail to my boy?

sentences.cn: 有一日维纳斯和儿子丘比特戏耍时, 胸脯被丘比特的一支箭划了一下.
sentences.en: Venus, playing one day with her boy Cupid, wounded her bosom with one of his arrows.

sentences.cn: 小男孩；小伙子
sentences.en: a little/small/young boy

sentences.cn: 当上总统的本地小伙子
sentences.en: ...the local boy who made President...

sentences.cn: 姑娘开始对小伙子感兴趣的年龄
sentences.en: ...the age when girls get interested in boys.

sentences.cn: 他是个不同一般的棒极了的小伙子.
sentences.en: He is a strange boy and very good.

sentences.cn: 如果你向那个小伙子献殷勤, 他大概会逃掉.
sentences.en: If you fling yourself at that boy, he's likely to run away.

sentences.cn: 赫斯渥惨然一笑, 这个小伙子则大笑起来.
sentences.en: Hurstwood smiled grimly, and the boy laughed.

sentences.cn: 格雷斯这样公开地追求那个小伙子,真应该感到害臊.
sentences.en: Grace ought to be ashamed of herself , hurling herself at that boy so openly.

sentences.cn: 我希望你不再为那个小伙子伤心叹息.
sentences.en: I hope you are not still sighing over that boy.

sentences.cn: 汉克: 我得马上抓着狗儿,系上牵狗带. 来这里,小伙子!
sentences.en: Hank: I'll grab him away and put him on the leash. Here boy!

sentences.cn: 他好像是个永远年轻的小伙子.
sentences.en: He is, as it were, an eternal boy.

sentences.cn: 这小伙子一天就吃光了一个星期的食品!
sentences.en: That boy has eaten through a week's supply in a day!

sentences.cn: 让小伙子自己建功立业吧!
sentences.en: Let the boy win his spurs.

sentences.cn: 当那个新来的小伙子在旁边时,他真是尽施魅力.
sentences.en: She really turns on the charm when that new boy is around.

sentences.cn: 从前, 有个小伙子和一位魔术师住在一起.
sentences.en: Once a time, a young boy lived with a sorcerer.

sentences.cn: 但是他尽管是一个好学向上的小伙子, 在规定的范围内却并不十分好学.
sentences.en: But though studious as a boy, he was not studious within the prescribed limits.

sentences.cn: 非常感谢你, 小伙子.
sentences.en: Thank you very much, boy.

sentences.cn: 我看没有什么不可以的, 小伙子.
sentences.en: I don't see why not, big boy.

sentences.cn: 大城市的生活吸引著许多乡下小伙子.
sentences.en: Life in big city is a lure for many country boy.

sentences.cn: 那个伤心的小伙子多次躲在别人见不到的地方哭了.
sentences.en: More than once the sad boy hid himself where he couldn't be seen and cried.

sentences.cn: 这个名叫安德鲁的最年轻的小伙子是个早熟且出类拔萃的运动员.
sentences.en: This youngest boy, Andrew, was a precocious excellent athlete.

sentences.cn: 也许并不是这个小伙子干的,只是遭人诬陷而已.
sentences.en: Maybe the boy did not do it and was falsely accused.

sentences.cn: 如果说她是那个天真烂漫的小姑娘, 波洛克就是那个笨头笨脑的小伙子.
sentences.en: If she was the naive girl, Guy Pollock was the clumsy boy.

sentences.cn: 要是有个英俊的小伙子邀请我做他的舞会搭档就好了.
sentences.en: If only some handsome boy invited me to be his partner at the ball.

sentences.cn: 只要简看上哪个小伙子, 他一定跑不了.
sentences.en: When Jane pursues a boy, he's a dead duck.

sentences.cn: 多年前我还是个毛头小伙子的时候就认识他了.
sentences.en: I knew him years ago when I was a boy.

sentences.cn: “ 快点,老奶奶! ” “不要紧, 小伙子, 用不了多长时间. ”
sentences.en: " Granny, quickly! "" Never mind, my boy, it won't take long. ”

sentences.cn: 他在这种难堪的环境中渐渐长大,长成了一个高个子, 脾气古怪, 神情恍惚的小伙子.
sentences.en: He grew awkwardly into a tall, strange, dreamy boy.

sentences.cn: 这时比拉尔双手叉在腰上,作弄人地望着那小伙子.
sentences.en: Pilar stood with her hands on her hips looking at the boy mockingly now.

sentences.cn: 你变了许多, 已经长成大小伙子了.
sentences.en: You've changed a lot. You have grown big boy.

sentences.cn: 那辆自行车是在20年前当泰德还是个15岁的小伙子时被偷去的.
sentences.en: It was stolen twenty years ago when Ted was a boy of fifteen.

sentences.cn: 趴下，小家伙，趴下！
sentences.en: Down, boy, down!

sentences.cn: 哇，好家伙！想想看我会告诉他什么。
sentences.en: Oh Boy! Just think what I could tell him.

sentences.cn: 啊! 好家伙, 你真是野心勃勃. 当个大法官谈何容易.
sentences.en: Ah! my boy, you are flying high. It is difficult to become a Lord Chancellor.

sentences.cn: 你的儿子是个多么可爱的小家伙呵!
sentences.en: What a fine little beggar your boy is!

sentences.cn: 哦,小家伙! 我过去常干些傻事儿.
sentences.en: Oh boy, I used to do some crazy things.

sentences.cn: □好家伙, 那个男售货员是我见过的最愚蠢的人.
sentences.en: Boy, that salesman was the biggest airhead I've ever seen.

sentences.cn: 好家伙, 他象他们所说的南方人那样吃不消了吗? ( 休斯鲁德 )
sentences.en: Boy, has he cut a fat hog , as they say down home ( Hughes Rudd )

sentences.cn: 听着, 老家伙, 没人稀罕你那该死的感激.
sentences.en: Look here, old boy, no one is interested in your bloody appreciation.

sentences.cn: 走开, 讨厌的小家伙!
sentences.en: Buzz off, you nasty little boy!

sentences.cn: 你这小家伙儿个头真大啊.
sentences.en: What a big little boy you are.

sentences.cn: 那小孩被一粗鲁的家伙挤到一边.
sentences.en: The boy was pushed aside by a rough fellow.

sentences.cn: 那小子是个坏家伙,大家都躲着他.
sentences.en: The boy was a bad actor and everybody tried to back away from him.

sentences.cn: 无畏地, 他又再一次转回原来的位置以让我们拍摄更多的好照片.好家伙!
sentences.en: Undaunted, he reverts to his old position for us to take more shots, good boy!

sentences.cn: 就在第一天,小家伙就已经在篱笆上钉了37个钉子.
sentences.en: The first day boy had driven 37 nails into the fence.

sentences.cn: ‘ 我那亲爱的小家伙爱德蒙他在哪儿, ’.
sentences.en: And where is the dear boy, our little Edmond?'

sentences.cn: 罗丝: 你是打算省钱 吗 ?你这个坏家伙.
sentences.en: Rose: Are you trying to save money? You bad boy.

sentences.cn: 比尔被一个坏家伙用一个旅行袋打在背上,打得他青一块紫一块.
sentences.en: Bill was black and blue by a bad boy with a traveling bag on his back.

sentences.cn: 好家伙! 真热得要命!
sentences.en: Boy! Isn't it hot!

sentences.cn: 好家伙! 阿瑟真的是胖成个大圆球了.
sentences.en: Boy , Arthur has really turned into a butterball.

sentences.cn: 好家伙, 那个男售货员是我见过的最愚蠢的人.
sentences.en: Boy, that salesman is the biggest airhead I have ever seen.

sentences.cn: 警察抓住了那个企图拐走这男孩以便勒索赎金的家伙.
sentences.en: The police caught the man who tried to abduct the boy for ransom.

sentences.cn: 那个家伙是来这儿监视我们的.
sentences.en: That boy came here to spy on us.

sentences.cn: 走开, 你这个家伙.
sentences.en: Get out of my way, boy.

sentences.cn: 老家伙马上就要气炸了.
sentences.en: That old boy is going to explode soon.

sentences.cn: 他是个有朝气的好家伙.
sentences.en: He's a good old boy.

sentences.cn: 那你是个非常忙碌的家伙了.
sentences.en: Youre a busy boy then.

sentences.cn: 瞧那个小家伙 ( 勇敢的小男孩 ).
sentences.en: Look at the little beggar ( the brave little boy ).

sentences.cn: 他是个六岁左右的小家伙.
sentences.en: He was a shrimp of a boy, about six years old.

sentences.cn: 那可确实激怒了那个老家伙。
sentences.en: That really teed off the old boy.

sentences.cn: 哇，好家伙！想想看我会告诉他什么。
sentences.en: Oh Boy! Just think what I could tell him.

sentences.cn: 这位服务员拿起瓶子, 即刻转过身,毫不费力的拧开了瓶盖.
sentences.en: The boy took the bottle, turned his back momentarily and loosened the cap without difficulty.

sentences.cn: 服务员, 请把我的行李拿进船舱.
sentences.en: Boy, please bring my baggage to my cabin.

sentences.cn: 这位青年服务员会引您去您的房间.
sentences.en: The bell boy will take you to your room.

sentences.cn: 请派一位服务员上来帮我拿行李.
sentences.en: Please send up a boy to help me with my luggage.

sentences.cn: 这里面的饭店眼下正要添个服务员.
sentences.en: They're looking for an extra boy in the hotel inside there right now.

Sentence.sentence: The little boy walked out of the school with his head and shoulders hanging down.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A nine-year-old central California boy braved strong currents and cold water to swim from San Francisco to Alcatraz Island and back.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: At 8 years old, he worked as a kitchen boy for a restaurant in Paris in exchange for room and board.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: He was saving the life of a 9-month-old boy who was blown into the path of an oncoming subway train by a high wind.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In my dreams I would have twins, a boy and a girl.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Indeed, Google, for which Leslie expresses admiration, is also his frequent whipping boy.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The TV station reported that by completing the swim the fourth-grade student from Los Banos broke a record previously held by a ten-year-old boy.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A
